Utility Operations
==================

Overview
--------

The utility operations module provides mathematical utilities, property calculations, and supporting functions for process analysis and design calculations. These utilities support all other unit operations with common calculations and data processing capabilities.

Available Utility Categories
----------------------------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   mathematical_utilities
   property_calculations
   data_processing
   regression_analysis

Mathematical Utilities
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Mathematical utility functions provide:

- Numerical integration and differentiation
- Root finding and optimization algorithms
- Linear algebra operations
- Statistical analysis functions
- Interpolation and extrapolation methods

**Key Features:**

- Robust numerical methods
- Error handling and validation
- Performance optimization
- Scientific computing integration
- Unit conversion utilities

Property Calculations
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Property calculation utilities include:

- Thermodynamic property correlations
- Transport property estimation
- Equation of state implementations
- Phase equilibrium calculations

**Key Features:**

- Multiple correlation options
- Temperature and pressure dependencies
- Mixture property calculations
- Uncertainty quantification
- Database integration

Data Processing
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Data processing utilities provide:

- Time series analysis
- Signal filtering and smoothing
- Outlier detection and removal
- Data validation and quality checks

**Key Features:**

- Real-time data processing
- Batch processing capabilities
- Visualization support
- Export and import functions
- Database connectivity

Regression Analysis
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Regression analysis utilities include:

- Linear and nonlinear regression
- Parameter estimation methods
- Model validation techniques
- Uncertainty analysis

**Key Features:**

- Multiple regression algorithms
- Cross-validation methods
- Statistical significance testing
- Confidence interval calculations
- Model selection criteria

Applications
------------

Utility functions are used for:

- **Data Analysis**: Process data analysis and interpretation
- **Model Development**: Parameter estimation and validation
- **Process Design**: Supporting calculations for all unit operations
- **Optimization**: Mathematical optimization algorithms
- **Quality Control**: Data validation and quality assurance
